Description: Reconstructed (from numerous fragments) small South Ionian pottery jug with ring foot and tall offset rim; exterior: reserved with bands around junction of rim and shoulder, body, and foot; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 324)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 670, no. 285)
Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (NAU32, pl.8i)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.061)
